content: The **Singapore men's national under-18 basketball team** is a national [basketball](/wiki/Basketball) team of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), administered by the [Basketball Association of Singapore](/wiki/Basketball_Association_of_Singapore) (***BAS***), formerly the Singapore Amateur Basketball Association (SABA). It represents the country in international under-18 men's basketball competitions. ## [FIBA Under-18 Asia Cup](/wiki/FIBA_Under-18_Asia_Cup) participations YearResult(/wiki/1970_ABC_Junior_Championship)7th(/wiki/1972_ABC_Under-18_Championship)6th(/wiki/1974_ABC_Under-18_Championship)8th197714th197813th(/wiki/1980_ABC_Under-18_Championship)10th(/wiki/1982_ABC_Under-18_Championship)12th(/wiki/1984_ABC_Under-18_Championship)7thYearResult(/wiki/1989_ABC_Under-18_Championship)14th(/wiki/1992_ABC_Under-18_Championship)12th(/wiki/1995_ABC_Under-18_Championship)12th(/wiki/1996_ABC_Under-18_Championship)14th(/wiki/2000_ABC_Under-18_Championship)16th(/wiki/2004_FIBA_Asia_Under-18_Championship)15th(/wiki/2006_FIBA_Asia_Under-18_Championship)15th(/wiki/2012_FIBA_Asia_Under-18_Championship)16th - [Singapore men's national basketball team](/wiki/Singapore_men%27s_national_basketball_team) - [Singapore men's national under-16 basketball team](/wiki/Singapore_men%27s_national_under-16_basketball_team) - [Singapore women's national under-18 basketball team](/wiki/Singapore_women%27s_national_under-18_basketball_team) - "Basketball Association Of Singapore". bas.org.sg.
